questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image of the equipment.
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again.
confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment.
prepare the Incident/Damage or Missing report.
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON.
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230.
shift the equipment to another place where AC Voltage of 230 is provided
check the continuity of power cord and confirm whether it is defective.
replace the power cord with a new one
check and confirm whether the power input and output voltages are available at the control board.

videos.videoName: Video for checking voltages of I/P & O/P

questions.question: repair / replace the control board accordingly
check and confirm whether the paper is rolling during the ECG is taken.
place the paper roll properly and confirm whether the problem still persist.
open the equipment as shown in the video, check and confirm is there any dust or obstruction in the gears.
clean the gears
check and confirm is there any breakage/damage to the gears.
replace the gears with a new one
replace the motor with a new one
check and confirm whether the print on ECG is dull or no print of ECG.
place the paper roll properly and confirm whether the problem still persist.
open the equipment as shown in the video, clean the thermal head with a soft cloth and confirm whether the problem still persist.

videos.videoName: Video for cleaning the thermal head

questions.question: replace the thermal head with a new one

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the thermal head

questions.question: check and confirm whether there is lot of AC and muscle interference in the ECG print out.
check the AC line for earthing and connect it properly
check and confirm whether there is a straight line in the ECG print.
image: IMAGES REQUIRED OF ECG PRINT WITH STRAIGHT LINE.

questions.question: replace the main board
check and confirm whether the buttons / some of the buttons don’t respond while pressing.
open the equipment as shown in the video, check and confirm for any loose connection / breakage of cable from switch control to control board.
reseat / replace the cable accordingly
check the continuity of buttons and confirm whether the buttons are defective
replace the buttons accordingly
repair / replace the switch control board accordingly and confirm whether the problem still persist

videos.videoName: Video for replacing switch control board

questions.question: repair / replace the control board accordingly
If the problem is not yet solved, contact the Technical Team for any other assistance through video call
Thanks
